name: Bus! Stop!
description:
You're naked, you have a shotgun, you're in half of a bus speeding down the highway in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, and there are baddies chasing you. There are no consequences to your actions so shoot things.

I came up with the idea on 3/20/2021 at 1630 and I completed the prototype on 3/20/2021 at 2030.
